name: Vital Skincare Brightening Concealer With Hyaluronic Acid
about: What it is: A precise, buildable-coverage undereye concealer clinically shown to reduce the look of dark circles, featuring serum-strength skincare to hydrate, visibly brighten, and soothe...Coverage: Medium.Finish: Natural.Formulation: Liquid.Highlighted Ingredients: - Gentian Root, Coffee Leaf Extract, and Licorice Root: Visibly brighten dark circles and hyperpigmentation and lift and firm the look of the eye contour..- Mini Hyaluronic Acid: Features a low molecular weight for optimal absorption; hydrates, and visibly firms and smooths..- Peptides: Support natural collagen and soften the look of crepiness, fine lines, and crowu2019s feet...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: In Vital Skincare Brightening Concealer, professional-performance pigments and potent skincare combine for breathable coverage that feels as good as it looks. This concealer builds and sets in seconds to blur the look of texture for a creaseless finish. Hyaluronic acid and peptides hydrate and firm while Vital Wakeup Complex visibly evens tone and diminishes dark circles over time...Clinical Results: In a consumer study with 36 participants, results show:.- It leaves quick and lasting hydration even after product is removed.- After 4 weeks, bare skin around the eye feels firmer, lifted, smoother, and looks brighter..In a clinical study with 30 participants, after 8 weeks the product was clinically shown to:.- Boost hydration levels by 21%..Clean.Clean at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing effectiveness.
ingredients: -Gentian Root, Coffee Leaf Extract, and Licorice Root: Visibly brighten dark circles and hyperpigmentation and lift and firm the look of the eye contour..-Mini Hyaluronic Acid: Features a low molecular weight for optimal absorption; hydrates, and visibly firms and smooths. .-Peptides: Support natural collagen and soften the look of crepiness, fine lines, and crowu2019s feet. ..Water (Aqua), C9-12 Alkane, Octyldodecyl Neopentanoate, Glycerin, Diisostearoyl Polyglyceryl-3 Dimer Dilinoleate, Sodium Potassium Aluminum Silicate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Tribehenin, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Gentiana Lutea Root Extract, Coffea Arabica (Coffee) Seed Extract, Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-4, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Disodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Sodium Chloride, Caprylyl Glycol, Propylene Carbonate, Potassium Sorbate, Silica, Propanediol, Aluminum Hydroxide, Citric Acid, May Contain/Peut Contenir (+/-) : Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), Bismuth Oxychloride (Ci 77163)...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-To brighten under eyes, dot or dash directly onto skin and blend with fingers in a dabbing motion. .-Use as a spot concealer where extra coverage is needed to cover hyperpigmentation and redness..-When choosing your shade, make sure to blend out the formula and allow the color to fully set. ..Gucci Westmanu2019s Tip:.-For a more refined finish, use the Westman Atelier Baby Blender Brush (sold separately).
